Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 5 & 15 Wayside Road is situated just five miles from Interstate 93 and 15 miles from downtown Boston.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5 & 15 Wayside Road is a two-building, Class-A property located in Burlington, Massachusetts. The 271,434 square foot office complex is comprised of two interconnected, four-story and five-story office buildings constructed in 1999 and 2001.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Office Space in Burlington, MA

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Highly efficient layout tailored to tenant requirements
Excellent highway exposure and access via Exit 33A off Interstate 95
Capital Improvements including food service with coffee bar, fitness center and shower/locker area, conference center, modern lighting and flooring

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Mature corporate environment overlooking Interstate 95 at Exit 33A. Corporate
neighbors include Samsung, Charles River Systems, FIS Global, Raytheon and Sophos.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Full amenity package (renovated in 2016) includes cafeteria with indoor and outdoor seating, conference center, fitness center with lockers/showers, a coffee bar with Starbucks/New England Coffee, and courtyard meeting areas. Five restaurants, a variety of retail options and several hotels are within walking distance of the property. Building features include state-of-the-art HVAC, electrical systems with dual-fed power from two separate substations, 12' ceilings and a landscaped courtyard.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Corner suite with great windows. Spec Layout and finishes with new paint and carpet throughout.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located in Burlington, Massachusetts, 2 Burlington Woods is strategically positioned along Interstate 95/ Route 128, just one half mile from Exit 33A. 2 Burlington Woods is within minutes of best-in-class amenities, including some of the areas top dining,
fitness and retail options.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Three suites available contiguous to 16,567 SF. 5,604 SF; 5,337 SF; 5,626 SF

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Approximately 12 miles northwest of Boston. The building is located on Mall Road at
the corner of South Bedford Road, between Lahey Clinic and the Burlington Marriott.
Convenient northwest suburban location with close access to Routes 128, 3 and
Interstate 93. Located 0.5 miles from the Burlington Mall within walking distance of
numerous shops and restaurants at Wayside Commons. 25 Mall Road benefits from immediate access to a diverse amenity base. The asset also enjoys prominent positioning along Mall Road, a major Burlington thoroughfare, with swift access to Interstate 95 (Route128) and Route 3 complemented by MBTA bus service to the Alewife Red Line station.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Totaling 287,776 square feet, 25 Mall Road is a six-story
asset features a variety of on-site amenities including a conference center, fitness
center, coffee kiosk and full-service cafeteria with an outdoor patio. 25 Mall Road represents an institutional-quality asset featuring flexible, efficient floor plates. The property boasts a strong history of tenant retention, serving as a clear testament to the quality of the asset and its location.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Three suites available contiguous to 14,755. 8,663 SF; 3,363 SF; 2,729 SF

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Modern design throughout building with extensive redevelopment
Amenities include a full-service cafe, a conference center, a fitness center with full-service locker rooms and on-site property management

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is in the heart of Burlington and benefits from proximity to many restaurants and retail amenities. The communitys forward-thinking leadership has led to improved retail, exciting dining, hotels and entertainment options.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
67 South Bedford Street offers 176,886 SF of Class A office and medical space in one of Bostons greatest suburbs, Burlington, Massachusetts. The building is conveniently located with visibility and access to major routes, including Route 128 and Route 3.

67 South Bedford was recently transformed through an extensive redevelopment and now boasts upgraded lobbies, amenities, common areas, outdoor patios, signage, wayfinding and landscaping. The building offers a modern environment with all the amenities companies need to retain and recruit talent both inside and out. The offering includes a full-service cafe, a conference center, a fitness center with full-service locker rooms and on-site property management
